arts.ttl: Bruno Fernandes gives backing to Rasmus Hojlund after Man United striker's drought continues in Real Sociedad victory as captain says he is 'sure the goals will come'
arts.sum: Bruno Fernandes is confident that the goals will come for Rasmus Hojlund if he continues to work as hard for the team as he did on Thursday night.

arts.ttl: 'I'm proud of him' - Dorgu's display of sportsmanship
arts.sum: Man Utd boss Ruben Amorim says he is proud of Patrick Dorgu after the wing-back told the referee it was wrong to award him a penalty against Real Sociedad.

arts.ttl: Man United's Bruno Fernandes breaks Europa League record with heroic Real Sociedad hat-trick
arts.sum: Manchester United captain Bruno Fernandes breaks a Europa League record with his heroic hat-trick in Thursday's 4-1 last-16 second-leg success over Real Sociedad.

arts.ttl: Man Utd 4-1 Real Sociedad (5-2 agg): Match report & 4 talking points as Amorim's team give statement performance
arts.sum: Analysing the key talking points from Manchester United's Europa League last 16 second leg clash with Real Sociedad.

arts.ttl: Patrick Dorgu tells referee he was WRONG to award him a penalty against Real Sociedad - before decision is overturned
arts.sum: Patrick Dorgu bizarrely told the referee not to give Manchester United a penalty during the Red Devils' win over Real Sociedad. Video replays then showed Dorgu saying he had not been foule.

arts.ttl: Fernandes hat-trick powers electric Manchester United past Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Manchester United kept their trophy hopes alive with a swaggering display that battered Real Sociedad and must be the Ruben Amorim blueprint. From the moment they fell behind early on, his side electrified, as if finally locating the high-voltage socket under him and gleefully plugging themselves in. United came at Sociedad relentlessly, a whir of energy and creativity that is the best advertisement yet for where their head coach might take them. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Man United 4-1 Real Sociedad (5-2 agg.): Bruno Fernandes hits hat-trick as Red Devils reach Europa League last eight
arts.sum: Red Devils played excellently and scored four times on the night to oust Sociedad

arts.ttl: Man United 4-1 Real Sociedad (5-2 on agg) - PLAYER RATINGS: Who rolled back the years at Old Trafford? Which star delivered a performance full of excitement? And who must do better?
arts.sum: AADAM PATEL AT OLD TRAFFORD: Bruno Fernandes scored a hat-trick to lead Manchester United into the Europa League quarter-finals after a 5-2 aggregate win over Real Sociedad.

arts.ttl: Man United 4-1 Real Sociedad: Highlights, man of the match, stats as hat-trick hero Bruno Fernandes sends Red Devils into last eight
arts.sum: Manchester United book their spot in the quarter-finals of the Europa League courtesy of a 5-2 aggregate success over Real Sociedad in the last-16 stage of the competition.

arts.ttl: Man United 4-1 Real Sociedad (5-2 agg): Bruno Fernandes scores hat-trick as Red Devils progress to Europa League quarter-finals after much improved display
arts.sum: MAN UNITED 4-1 REAL SOCIEDAD (5-2 AGG) - CHRIS WHEELER AT OLD TRAFFORD: Old Trafford rocked and roared as United kept their Europa League hopes - and season - alive.
